reviews.review_msg: Awesome teacher. I couldn't possibly recommend him more. Especially if you're into creative writing. He gives great advice on how to improve your writing and different things to consider in your own writing.

To say the least, David makes you identify with the material -- it's like you're bound to feel it somewhere in your past history, or present. But once you're there, you discover that post-colonial life is one big pile of complicated, diabolical #### and david is the symbol of this mess. Otherwise, he marks fairly if you parrot the secondary sources
